title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Optimized Speech and Phonological Learning Program for Bilingual Individuals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce new phonetic features (e.g., glottal stop) with 70% accuracy through imitation and spontaneous regeneration experiments
Learners can improve phonological learning efficiency by 30% by utilizing cognitive strategies associated with bilingual acquisition experiences
Learners can analyze personal pronunciation patterns within two weeks through a voice recording-feedback system in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
